<center><h3> Friendship book </h3></center>
In addition to the main gift, we would like to gift Fabio a [“friendship book”](https://mijnvriendenboekje.nl/product) and we need your input for that!

***Please click [here]() to access Fabio's friendship book.***

**Deadline to fill out:** Monday, April 8th, 2024

**You will be asked to:**

+ Answer several questions about Fabio
+ Write a short personal message
+ Upload a picture of yourself

Everything on your page is optional so you can also leave out questions or a picture if you prefer that.

If you cannot access the link, please reach out to us by clicking [here](mailto:noon.abdulqadir@gmail.com) and we will add you.

If you have more pictures which you would like to see in this “friendship book”, please send them to us by clicking [here](mailto:noon.abdulqadir@gmail.com).
